typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'excel',
	container: 'data-cleanse',
	folderPath: 'Staging',
	fileName: 'Customer Deep Dive.xlsx',
	sheetName: 'Sales Orders',
	firstRowAsHeader: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
